conversion_info.description: Information about the conversion process to FAIR format.

total_number_of_points.description: Total number of data points in the dataset (e.g., X_points * Y_points for 2D).

data_axis_minimum_value_defined.description: Defined minimum value of the data axis. For 2D, this may relate to the full range of the ADC for the linearized 2D data block or a display default. Actual swept range per dimension is derived from other parameters.

data_axis_maximum_value_defined.description: Defined maximum value of the data axis. For 2D, this may relate to the full range of the ADC for the linearized 2D data block or a display default. Actual swept range per dimension is derived from other parameters.

jcamp_spectral_data_structure_parameter.description: JCAMP-DX parameter related to spectral data structure. For 1D, spectrum status. For 2D, might be points in first dimension (e.g. F2 size) or data block size.

number_of_points_x_dimension.description: Number of data points in the X-dimension (often the directly acquired dimension or F2).

number_of_points_y_dimension.description: Number of data points in the Y-dimension (often the indirectly acquired dimension or F1).

x_dimension_axis_start_value.description: Start value for the X-dimension axis.

x_dimension_axis_sweep_width.description: Sweep width for the X-dimension axis.

y_dimension_axis_start_value.description: Start value for the Y-dimension axis.

y_dimension_axis_sweep_width.description: Sweep width for the Y-dimension axis.

x_dimension_axis_unit.description: Unit for the X-dimension axis (e.g., 'G' for Gauss).

y_dimension_axis_unit.description: Unit for the Y-dimension axis (e.g., 'dB' for decibels).

instrument_manufacturer_jcamp.description: JCAMP-DX originating system or instrument manufacturer.

x_dimension_experiment_type_jcamp.description: JCAMP-DX experiment type for the X-dimension (e.g., 'field-sweep').

y_dimension_experiment_type_jcamp.description: JCAMP-DX experiment type for the Y-dimension (e.g., 'mw-power-sweep').

number_of_points_x_dimension_alias_res.description: Number of points in the X-dimension (Bruker 'RES' parameter, typically equals SSX).

number_of_points_y_dimension_alias_rey.description: Number of points in the Y-dimension (Bruker 'REY' parameter, typically equals SSY).

x_dimension_magnetic_field_center.description: Center of the magnetic field sweep (typically for the X-dimension).

x_dimension_magnetic_field_sweep_width.description: Width of the magnetic field sweep (typically for the X-dimension).

receiver_conversion_time.description: Analog-to-digital conversion time per data point.

receiver_time_constant.description: Time constant of the receiver signal filter.

receiver_gain.description: Overall gain of the receiver (often a relative value or code).

magnetic_field_modulation_amplitude.description: Amplitude of the magnetic field modulation (typically peak-to-peak).

microwave_power_attenuation_setting_init.description: Microwave power attenuation setting in dB, relative to maximum source power. For power sweeps (2D), this is often the initial attenuation value for the Y-dimension.
